get.description: Gets all attendees owned by the specified user.

parameters.name: externalID
parameters.description: The external ID of an attendee. By entering a value for this parameter, you can limit the results to the attendees who match the specified external ID. Up to 10 comma-separated external IDs may be specified.

parameters.name: attendeeTypeID
parameters.description: The ID of an attendee type. By entering a value for this parameter, you can limit the results to the attendees who match the specified type.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point of the next set of results, after the limit specified in the limit field has been reached.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return. Default value: 25

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user that has added the attendee to an expense. The user who is performing this API request must have the Web Services Admin (Professional) or Can Administer (Standard) user role to use this parameter.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user that has added the attendee to an expense. The user who is performing this API request must have the Web Services Admin (Professional) or Can Administer (Standard) user role to use this parameter.

get.summary: Get a single attendee by ID
get.description: Gets a single attendee by ID.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user that has added the attendee to an expense. The user who is performing this API request must have the Web Services Admin (Professional) or Can Administer (Standard) user role to use this parameter.

put.description: Updates the specified attendee. Only the fields provided in the supplied object are updated. Missing fields are not altered.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The partial or complete Attendee object to update.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user that has added the attendee to an expense. The user who is performing this API request must have the Web Services Admin (Professional) or Can Administer (Standard) user role to use this parameter.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the attendee to delete.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user that has added the attendee to an expense. The user who is performing this API request must have the Web Services Admin (Professional) or Can Administer (Standard) user role to use this parameter.
